mission.description: HYDRA has attacked Williams Innovations and are attempting to steal their experimental Iso-8 technology. Recover what you can before it falls into their hands.
mission.previewText: Cleanup on Iso-8

mission.description: HYDRA isn't content with just stealing his tech; they are also intent on capturing Wonder Man himself. Unfortunately, he is out cold, and we need to protect him while he regains consciousness.
mission.previewText: Visiting Hours are Over

mission.description: HYDRA is attempting a full assault on Avengers Tower in an effort to get to Wonder Man. Luckily, Wonder Man has recovered, and we'll need his help to keep HYDRA and Grim Reaper at bay.
mission.previewText: Fear the Reaper

mission.description: Looks like A.I.M. has taken on a new level of Extremism. Find out what their project is, shut it down, you know the drill.
mission.previewText: Relics of the cold war are up to bat.

mission.description: A mercenary psychopath with nanotech superpowers. What could possibly go wrong? Stark Tower may be about to find out.
mission.previewText: Baby it's cold out there.

mission.description: Time is running out for Savin and his A.I.M. friends, but they didn't do this alone. Who is behind the Extremis project?
mission.previewText: Saving Eric Savin

mission.description: Now that Ultron's escaped, he's begun a mysterious project. Whatever it is, we have to stop it before it's finished.
mission.previewText: Ultron has escaped captivity and is acquiring manufacturing facilities... but why?

mission.description: The Vision android may be our ticket to defeating Ultron... or he might turn on us again. After we recover his pieces from the U-Foes, we'll find out.
mission.previewText: S.H.I.E.L.D. goes on an android scavenger hunt.

mission.description: Vision is operational and seems to be on our side. Good thing, too - Ultron has taken over every other cybernetic system in the city.
mission.previewText: The final push to eradicate Ultron.

mission.description: Faced with overwhelming odds and old and new adversaries alike, S.H.I.E.L.D. looks to the stars for aid.
Damage control is the name of the game as coordinated attacks increase in frequency and severity. Can S.H.I.E.L.D. maintain control of the situation or will it spiral out of control?
All the pieces are now in play. Will New York escape this stellar strife unscathed or will S.H.I.E.L.D. prevail with the aid of its new allies?

Transported to the Savage Land and cut off, the next generation of powered people are put to the test. Will they crack under the stress of survival, abandoning their ideals, or be forged into the stuff of true heroes? Heroes missing include; Kate Bishop, The Runaways, Nova, Cammi, Kamala Khan, Squirrel Girl, Ultimate Spider-Man, Spider-Gwen, Amazing Spider Woman, and Spider Girl.
In the Heart of Madripoor, the shining jewel of the Strait of Malacca, a den of scum and villainy has festered. Which is exactly where S.H.I.E.L.D. catches up with the powered youngsters...

While S.H.I.E.L.D. was away, someone decided to take a stab at the Raft. Has S.H.I.E.L.D. been lead out to sea, and will they be able to plug the holes in the Raft in time? Even if they succeed, what future repercussions will this oversight cause for S.H.I.E.L.D.?
Thanos has returned to Earth and a Test Subject army is unleashed. Taking intel from Maximus the Mad seems like the least of the problems.
The Black Order seem more interested in resolving a bad business agreement than engaging in global warfare. Something feels off, and all signs point back to Maximus.
The truth about Maximus is revealed, and now there is more at stake than just a Test Subject army.
A.I.M. and Hydra clash at Times Square.
mission.previewText: A.I.M. and Hydra clash at Times Square.

mission.description: Arnim Zola makes his move, setting up a HYDRA cell in London with a little help from Taskmaster.
mission.previewText: Taskmaster stands guard over a secret London meeting of HYDRA sub-bosses.

mission.description: Back In New York, A.I.M. has presented us with an ultimatum. Their demands are simple - give them Omega Sentinel or City Hall will be destroyed!
mission.previewText: A.I.M. has taken advantage of the diversion created by the Circle of 8. M.O.D.O.K. and Nitro threaten to blow up City Hall if S.H.I.E.L.D. doesn't hand over the Omega Sentinel.

mission.description: The Wrecking Crew have been spotted in San Francisco, but they're not on vacation. With help from the Jotuns, they've just attacked and raided a local museum.
mission.previewText: Jotun and C8 cultists seen working together. The Wrecking Crew is providing cover for an assault on archives containing records of a deep-sea research expedition.

mission.description: The Brotherhood and Circle of Eight have just laid siege to the Hellfire Club. They're not working together, so whatever is inside must be of critical importance to both groups.
mission.previewText: Try to recover critical Circle of Eight materials that could provide leads to their next move.

mission.description: Servoguards are swarming the Baxter Building, led by none other than... Savin?
mission.previewText: Savin has commandeered an army of Servo Guards to attack the Baxter Building.

mission.description: The White Gorillas have gotten their hands on Iso-8 and are rebelling. Time for a momentous journey to Wakanda!
mission.previewText: Grim Reaper, Man-Ape and the Maggia, what else could go wrong?

mission.description: The Wild Hunt has begun, and the rebel Asgardians are using Jotuns as their hunting dogs.
mission.previewText: Loki takes the reigns of the Wild Hunt.

mission.description: The Wrecking Crew have joined Executioner to stir up trouble.
mission.previewText: The chaos deepens as Executioner arrives in Manhattan.

mission.description: It was only a matter of time before Loki appeared... but now he's appearing everywhere. If his powers are increasing, he must be stopped immediately.
mission.previewText: The Wild Hunt finds its prey.

mission.description: Train With Shanna
In the wake of Thor's disappearance, S.H.I.E.L.D. looks to strange and unlikely allies to handle the growing threats.
Battling Iso-Saurs and Dark Elves in this heat? S.H.I.E.L.D. wishes for a cool reprieve...and gets it.
The dead and defeated come back to life at the beck and call of a power hungry coalition. How can you stop that which cannot grow weary or feel pain?
Electro and Vulture search for Spider-Man, claiming that he is required to fuel a machine capable of preventing... wait, fuel? No thanks.

Spiders from other dimensions are appearing all over the city, while an Inheritor roams the streets, searching for Spider-Totems. Some days, you actually hope it's just a Mysterio-induced hallucination.
When faced with fighting a powerful, dimension-hopping Inheritor or a group of home-grown thugs, the choice is clear. It’s time to take the fight to the Sinister Six.
St. Patrick's cathedral is under assault by Servo Guards, typically Doctor Doom's robotic soldiers. Work with Luke Cage to find out what's behind the attack.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Doctor Doom has to wait as the Maggia wreak havoc at the Brooklyn Bridge. The Fantastic Four's Thing is on hand to help shut down these Iso-8 enhanced mobsters.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The United Nations is under attack by R.A.I.D.. Heads of State are in danger and S.H.I.E.L.D. has a new priority.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Sentinels have been spotted in Times Square, Brotherhood Mutants have been seen in combat. Time to get in the middle of this.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: A mission deployment to Ryker's Island leads to trouble at Yankee Stadium.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Spider-Man's arch-nemesis Dr. Octopus has taken over the U.S.S. Intrepid. How about if you help the friendly neighborhood hero put Ock on ice?
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The doors have been blown off Ryker's Island as a massive jailbreak threatens the city.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Servo Guards are back, threatening Columbus Circle. Could Doctor Doom be close by?
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Hydro-Man and the U-foes have been spotted near the Chrsyler Building, this has Doom's fingerprints all over it. Let's find those fingers.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Avengers Tower is under threat and Sue Storm, the Invisible Woman, is ready to help you investigate the trouble.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The Empire State Building is surrounded by Servo Guards. We may have finally found Doctor Doom. Let's hope we're not too late.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Test subjects wired with horrific Iso-8 modifications have been spotted near the Museum. Wolverine senses the presence of Sabretooth, his nemesis and brother. Join him to stop this menace.
mission.previewText: Disoriented citizens with strange mutations have been seen wandering through Central Park.

mission.description: Alarm sensors in the museum indicate mysterious intruders...and rapidly falling temperatures.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: A.I.M. has taken over a lab complex on the Empire State University campus. Thousands of students are in danger, and whatever A.I.M. is cooking up in the lab will only make things worse.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The Wrecking Crew is rampaging through Chinatown breaking into small factories and warehouses. What do they want? Stop them from getting it.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Dr. Strange has detected powerful emanations of dark magic from St. Patrick's Cathedral. It's not just blasphemy, it's dangerous.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The renegade Asgardians aren't done. There are Jotun near the Brooklyn Bridge, and Loki himself has a dire plan for the city.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Hydra has used Iso-8 to create their own version of the Avengers. Put these impostors where they belong.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Loki's spell didn't work, but the magic it released has created new Iso-8-fused artifacts. Elements of New York's underworld will stop at nothing to get them.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Leaders of the mutant-rights movement are calling for demonstrations. Anti-mutant goons are ready to rumble. S.H.I.E.L.D. needs to keep a lid on it.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Escapees from Ryker's are joining up with existing criminal elements to form more powerful underworld gangs. Who's behind this?
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The radical mutant leaders are getting what they want: violence. S.H.I.E.L.D. is not going to let them turn the streets of New York into a battlefield.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Madame Masque has handed off her artifact collection, and the Hand is about to put it to use. There's a dangerous ritual brewing, and we've got to stop it.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: All those hotheads arrested during the mutant-rights riots are now in Ryker's. It's overcrowded and full of angry people. In other words, it's about to blow.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: HYDRA is moving with new energy and purpose down in Greenwich Village. They're getting ready for something big. What is it?
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Mutant provocateurs are hitting city landmarks, trying to provoke a violent response. Let's settle things down out there so we can concentrate on the real menace.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The Maggia strikes at S.H.I.E.L.D. leadership while a new villain makes his entry into the race for Iso-8.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Even when you beat Loki, you don't beat Loki. If he can't get you himself, he'll find a way to use the Destroyer.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The Hand's magical ritual wasn't a failure; it just took a while to happen. There are portals all over the Village, and God only knows what is coming through them.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The U-Foes are back, and possibly charged up with Iso-8. Also, is it an accident that they've been spotted at the Latverian Embassy?
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Technology and magic are a bad combination and A.I.M. intends to prove that point. With rogue Sentinels in tow, A.I.M. has blocked access to a portal in the NY Public library. Only Hulk can clear the way.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: With Nick Fury and Maria Hill missing, Congressional voices start trying to run S.H.I.E.L.D. their own way. But they don't know Tony Stark.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Another outbreak of experimental mutants! They're getting stronger, too. Magneto's going to have his own army if we don't do something.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Sentinels were sent in to keep the peace and end the mutant riots. They appear to have misunderstood their orders.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: HYDRA and the Hand would be strange comrades even in normal times. But now, the Hand looks to have found a new use for the portals to the Dark Dimension, and it's ugly. Almost as ugly as the Mindless Ones.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Jotun around the UN means Enchantress and Executioner can't be far away. But what are they looking for? And where is Loki?
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Coded messages come in from Director Fury. He's calling for action--and also maybe for a ride home.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Someone is still experimenting with MGH and Iso-8. The results aren't pretty, but they are dangerous. Put a stop to it.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The Hand is in Chinatown. So is Danny Rand. The neighborhood's not big enough for both of them, especially if the Hand is after more material for necromantic rituals.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Now A.I.M. is getting in on the game of turning portal magic to their own purposes. Doesn't fit the soulless-technocrat profile. Find out what they're up to.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Manhattan's underworld elements all seem to be reporting to the Hood now. And the Hood is working on a secret ritual. For who? You'll need to find him to find out.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: There were more open portals than we knew. Mindless Ones are pouring out of them faster than Dr. Strange can close them. We need to give him some cover while he works, or else...
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: A little piece of Britain comes to San Francisco, too bad it’s only the worst parts of Blighty.
Nautical mysteries continue to pile up, and the Maggia keep on the move, how could the two be linked?
Things get wild as key players make their way to the Savage Lands. What could this mean for the forces of S.H.I.E.L.D.?
No longer able to tolerate opposing agendas, internal stresses fracture HYDRA. Who will be victorious?
The fate and loyalty of HYDRA is decided. Can Captain America resist taking to the field with so many HYDRA agents around?
An Unlikely alliance between East and West predicates fresh waves of anxiety for S.H.I.E.L.D.. What else could go wrong?
HYDRA's masked super-soldier makes an appearance in San Francisco.
Tensions in Wakanda escalate as HYDRA operatives put Vibranium facilties at risk.
HYDRA takes their new super-soldier prototype for a test drive on the streets of New York.
Demons are pouring onto the streets outside Fisherman's Wharf. If that's not enough, the occult scientists of HYDRA are taking full advantage of the chaos, with Taskmaster at their head.
mission.previewText: Anything you can do, he can do better.

mission.description: HYDRA tags out, and the Maggia tag in. Meanwhile, we have reports of a huge, dark monster eating demons. Blackheart? Or something else?
mission.previewText: We decided to see how demon blood tastes...

mission.description: Blackheart and Mephisto are preparing to duke it out... with San Francisco's downtown as the arena.
mission.previewText: Mephisto and Blackheart have a father-son chat.

mission.description: Vampire attacks are on the rise and something stirs in the Dark Dimension. It must be that time of year again.
Dr. Strange searches for the source of the magical mischief, and uncovers dark dealings in the Otherworld.
As our three witches begin their spell, Spitfire races to the stop the ritual.
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
The gang war in Hell's Kitchen gets personal, and big players enter the fray.
The substance in the vial has been identified, leading to a grave discovery.
Someone loses control over Boomerang, who flies into the hands of S.H.I.E.L.D.
Mockingbird radioed in a report of AIM and the Maggia working together in Little Italy. That was the last we've heard from her.
mission.previewText: Mockingbird found AIM and the Maggia, but now we can't find her.

mission.description: The Wrecking Crew isn't known for their smarts, but Thunderball knows what he is doing. He's got thugs lifting supplies from Bellevue Hostpital. Get in there and remind him he's not a MD.
mission.previewText: The Wrecking Crew has its thugs stealing medical equiptment.

mission.description: Mockingbird's trail leads to Empire State University. Maybe we can audit a class and learn what is going on.
mission.previewText: Find Mockingbird before she becomes another Test Subject.

mission.description: Mockingbird's debrief mentioned the Hellfire Club and the White Queen. She was investigating near the Brooklyn Bridge before she was abducted. Is Emma Frost attacking S.H.I.E.L.D. Agents?
mission.previewText: The Hellfire Club surfaces in Manhattan.

mission.description: The Hellfire Club is using Sentinels to cause trouble near Pier 94, but who is using the Hellfire Club?
mission.previewText: Modified Sentinels have been spotted near Pier 94

mission.description: Labs hidden in the Meat Packing district are being used to create weaponized Test Subjects. If this continues, the Hellfire Club will have a private army.
mission.previewText: The Brotherhood of Evil Mutants are experimenting in the Meat Packing District

mission.description: Two new actors arrive on the world stage, as the divisive Civil War swirls around The High Evolutionary and the mysterious Profiler.
The fight lands in Wakanda, where both sides battle over the stores of Vibranium. Those who control the Vibranium control the world.
Suppressing Inhuman mutations to stop the Profiler and heal the rift between the factions is the order of the day. But with a Civil War of this magnitude, who in the end wins, or do we all lose?
Few know what the future holds, but if you did, what changes could be wrought, and what catastrophes avoided?
Hulk Smash Mysterious Device!
mission.previewText: Hulk Smash Mysterious Device!

mission.description: Hydra forces, led by Viper, appear to be after a mysterious energy signature.
mission.previewText: Hydra forces, led by Viper, appear to be after a mysterious energy signature.

mission.description: One of Viper's men escaped with a package that contained the energy signature you were after. You've traced it to an area where R.A.I.D. troops have been deployed with Whiplash leading them.
mission.previewText: R.A.I.D. troops have been deployed to the University District with Whiplash leading them.

mission.description: Hydra still hasn't given up, with Baron Zemo leading his men on a rampage through Chinatown.
mission.previewText: Hydra still hasn't given up, with Baron Zemo leading his men on a rampage through Chinatown.

mission.description: A.I.M. forces and an unknown presence threaten the Financial District.
mission.previewText: A.I.M. forces and an unknown presence threaten the Financial District.

mission.description: The chaos of the Pulse has attracted the attentions of a certain Trickster and his minions. The Avengers Mansion is threatened and S.H.I.E.L.D. must intervene .
mission.previewText: The chaos of the Pulse has attracted the attentions of a particular Trickster and his minions.

mission.description: The Phoenix Force has returned. A cosmic entity capable of destroying the planet, it has manifested within five X-Men. They have retreated to their base on Utopia, an island off the coast of California.
mission.previewText: The X-Men have returned to Utopia to investigate the power of the Phoenix Force.

mission.description: Back in Manhattan, the X-Men plan on paying the Avengers a visit in their own mansion. Some villains see this as a chance to raise tensions.
mission.previewText: Avenger's Mansion plays host to the X-Men.

mission.description: Tempers flare with the Phoenix's power. The Avengers clash with the X-Men on Alcatraz island to settle things once and for all.
mission.previewText: The final confrontation on Alcatraz Island.

mission.description: M.O.D.O.K. and Man-Ape are trying to break into the Vibranium Mound. Get to Wakanda and show them that they're out of their league.
The Fixer was working on an unsanctioned Sentinel project, and unfortunately someone else is now in control of it. Head to New York City and stop this threat before it grows out of our containment.

Madripoor, Pearl of the Pacific, and also a place where organized crime, from small time smuggling docks, to large scale enterprises with multi million dollar fronts call home. S.H.I.E.L.D. is expanding its operation area to include this area based off of a tip involving recent sightings of Count Nefaria.

Buccaneer Bay has been used as a haven for pirates, thieves and ne'er-do-wells for centuries. Now another is added to the list. It seems that the Mandarin is making a play amongst the Circle of Eight. We doubt he will be a willing participant with the Serpent, but either way, we should find out what he is planning and put a stop to it.
Reminding the Earth that Incursions are not the only threat, the Black Order returns.

Terrigenesis is suddenly on the rise. We suspect that Maximus and Mr. Sinister are working together to take this process to the next level. What for, we're not sure, but with those two minds together, you can guarantee the outcome will not be desirable.
What's black and white and red all over? The city, with Venom, Anti-Venom and Carnage on the loose.
To stop the symbiote epidemic from spreading further, S.H.I.E.LD. needs an Anti-Venom.
Symbiotes and modified Test Subjects together are more than a coincidence. Time to end this science project.
The Runaways go deep undercover, starting their work for the Kingpin. He seems like a nice guy, as long as the kids keep doing his dirty work.
It turns out the Runaways have a knack for criminal activities. It must be genetic.
The Runaways go on a field trip to the UN Headquarters. While they're there, the kids will learn about human rights and peacekeeping, and they'll make sure that all 193 flags remain unsmashed.
Doom's got the U-Foes doing his dirty work around town. We've spotted at least two of them near the Intrepid. Are they looking for something Doc Ock left behind?
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Looks like the criminal gangs are sick of working for other people. They're looking to do some magic of their own. Break 'em up before they figure out how the portals work again.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: A.I.M. is out in force along the Hudson waterfront. Is the mysterious shipment finally about to arrive? Intercept it if you can.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Baron Zemo's about to be reunited with an old, old friend. Not all reunions are happy occasions, and this one will be real bad news if it happens.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The Pulse has created strange alliances from day one. Now comes the strangest of them all...
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The Hand and HYDRA have perfected their resurrection magic. Guess who they want to use it on? That's right. Now we know why they were practicing on World War II corpses.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Magneto has declared Manhattan a mutants-only nation. New York's always been a little weird, but this is taking it too far.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: HYDRA's going back to its roots. They want to cleanse the world of Untermenschen...and this time they mean mutants.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: We might have solved the mystery of the test subjects once and for all, but with that answer comes more questions. What is the Circle of Eight?
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: New York's criminal gangs don't like it when someone else wants to call the shots...which means they don't like Magneto a bit.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Magneto's found a new use for Doom's Iso-8 emitter. If he can't drive all non-mutants out of New York, he'll make sure anyone who stays becomes a mutant, one way or another.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The Red Skull isn't wasting any time. He's moving to retake control of HYDRA. But the Syndicate has its own problems: The Red Skull comes in, Magneto breaks ranks.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Rumors of Loki's demise were greatly exaggerated. He's been using the Wrecking Crew to advance the chaos across the city.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Red Skull's return has thrown HYDRA into chaos. Normally that would be a good thing, but New York is caught in the middle of Zemo and Viper's power struggle.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: The Hood has gathered all the forces of the underworld to make his move. And if the Hood is involved, chances are Dormammu and the Dark Dimension are as well.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Where magic fails, science triumphs; at least that's what A.I.M. and M.O.D.O.K. believe. It's up to S.H.I.E.L.D. to prove him wrong.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Villains of all kinds are flocking to New York. It seems everyone is making an appearance... except for Dr. Doom. Where is he?
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Dr. Doom's game is revealed: the Syndicate was a lure, and S.H.I.E.L.D. has taken the bait. Doombots pour forth from the Latverian Embassy to meet them.
mission.previewText: [PLACEHOLDER]

mission.description: Crimson Dynamo's working for the Brotherhood now? Maybe they have a better 401k package than A.I.M.
mission.previewText: Villains aren't supposed to get crossovers, are they?

mission.description: Yorkville is infested with demonic portals. Hopefully the doors of the mayor's mansion are locked tight.
mission.previewText: A devil of a problem in Manhattan.

mission.description: Wonder Man's not going to like this. The Grim Reaper's back, and this time he has his sights set on becoming head of the Maggia.
mission.previewText: HYDRA snakes its way into New York's underworld.

mission.description: The Brotherhood's at it with their Mutant Growth Hormone experiments again. Luckily we have an expert on growth at our service: Hank Pym.
mission.previewText: Pym cuts the Brotherhood down to size.

mission.description: The Fixer's been tinkering in his garage again. This time he's decided to fix up Sentinels.
mission.previewText: Fantomex breaks Fixer. Allons-y!

mission.description: Grim Reaper's coup of the Maggia has turned into a massive crime family civil war. Send in The Punisher to do what he does best.
mission.previewText: Seems the Maggia forgot about Frank Castle. Time to remind them.

mission.description: Backed by the Serpent, the Worthy have set their sights on New York. Our heroes make a final attempt to connect with their former friends and allies before the final battle.
The rapidly spreading fear and chaos must not slow our heroes, as they race to engage each Worthy before the Serpent may join them.
The Serpent has arrived! It is time to strike a Mighty blow or face inescapable doom. The fate of Midgard hangs in the balance.

Adam Warlock, Cosmo, and Phyla-Vell manage to slip past Odin’s Barrier in one of Yondu’s Ravager ships, but they crash land in the Savage Lands while being pursued. Cosmo contacts the Guardians telepathically, informing them of their situation, but they have lost Adam somewhere in the Savage Lands in the crash. Making matters worse, Yondu is still pursuing them for revenge, least of all for being trapped on Earth...

Magus has emerged from his Cocoon and openly threatens the Serpent and his Worthy while claiming that he can bring down Odin’s Barrier. All those who wish for his “divine assistance” should come to his aid as he prepares to destroy the Barrier. The Mandarin struggles to retain control over Madripoor while it falls into chaos as villains of the world unite under Magus’s reign.

Cosmo proposes a plan using the combined telepathic might of Earth’s heroes to break into the Magus’s mind and free Adam, and not a moment too soon as Magus prepares to “break” the barrier. Strangely, the Serpent and his Worthy haven’t seemed to react much to Magus’s threats, but the actions of the Circle of 8 have been on the rise. Magus’s allies gather in New York where Magus is confronted at last only to learn a horrible truth.
Thor is still missing while The Circle of 8 are scouring San Francisco for the latest hammerfall. It's a race against time to prevent the rise of another Worthy.
A remnant of HYDRA has teamed up with the White Gorilla Guerrillas. It seems they're using their new muscle to try to overrun the City of Wakanda.
There are rumors in New York City that the criminal underworld is setting up a deal with the Hellfire Club. A mystical artifact is about to exchange hands, but in exchange for what remains a mystery.
Mindless Ones have been spotted in London. Dormammu makes his move as magical forces are gathered.
Demons are at war and London is their battlefield. S.H.I.E.L.D. is caught in the middle trying to keep the peace as matters escalate out of control.
Mr. Sinister is back, and he's set up shop in the Savage Land. Mutants have gone missing, and intel suggests they are being harvested for a sinister experiment.
There's another Test Subject outbreak in New York... but this time, something's different. What sinister motives lie beneath this attack?
Beast and Rogue have been abducted! Split up and find them before Sinister can distill their powers... or worse, hand them to Apocalypse.
Apocalypse's horsemen are riding and the end is nigh... but we still have a chance. Take them down one at a time, but carefully... our friends are in there somewhere, fighting to get out.
We've forced Apocalypse's hand, and now he's finally taken the field himself. This is our best chance to stop him for good... if we can get past his horsemen.
When the Maggia see chaos, they see opportunity. And when they see Iso-8, they see dollar signs. It's just business.
mission.previewText: The Maggia have begun to exert pressure on Little Italy.

mission.description: Take a crazed techno-terrorist group. Add a mad scientist who thinks he's a bird. What do you end up with? A problem S.H.I.E.L.D. needs fixed.
mission.previewText: Vulture and A.I.M. threaten the area around Bellevue Hospital.

mission.description: Ninjas in Hell's Kitchen? Yes. But they're not looking for Iso-8. Or are they...?
mission.previewText: The Hand threatens Hell's Kitchen.

mission.description: Organized criminal gangs are going after a secret Iso-8 symposium taking place at the UN Convention Center. It's not the Maggia. Who are these goons, and who's in charge?
mission.previewText: New York's Underworld is making a power grab at some Iso-8 at the Unconvention Center along the waterfront.

mission.description: The streets of Yorkville are suddenly full of angry, disoriented...mutants? What's causing this? The X-Men are coming in to assist S.H.I.E.L.D.'s investigation.
mission.previewText: Strange augmented and altered people have shown up in Yorkville.

mission.description: Cybernetic systems are going dangerously rogue in the area around Avengers Mansion. Is this a post-Pulse phenomenon, or something more sinister?
mission.previewText: A virus has caused a variety of robotic and mechanized threats to break out at the Avengers Mansion.

mission.description: Cut off from Asgard, we must stop the invading Dark Elves before London is overrun. All efforts should be focused on sealing their attack portals.
Heimdall has found a way to get us off of Midgard, and not a moment too soon -- the Dark Elves have invaded Asgard!
With our backs against the wall, a dangerous alliance is made. This could be the edge we need to emerge victorious... or it could simply hasten our demise.
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
DR training
As the Brotherhood continues to collapse, the vultures begin their descent.
Sentinels arrive in New York to put an end to the Brotherhood, but an unlikely protector comes to their aid.
The members of the Brotherhood escape to London, by request of Sebastion Shaw. Out of the flames and into the Hellfire?
Runic carvings, Hand artifacts, and an influx of Circle of 8 cultists. Someone is preparing a ritual in Wakanda.
The Dark Avengers call the Worthy to battle in the middle of London. They either really want a hammer of their own, or they've got a deathwish.
A new Incursion portal appears in New York, but before the team can respond, someone takes matters into their own hands.
Arcade chooses Spider-Man as the next contestant in...the Murderworld. Come on down!
A hammer has fallen somewhere in the city, drawing out villains seeking an opportunity to become the next Worthy.
HYDRA sets its eyes on their next target.
Betty Ross, Bruce Banner’s wife, and “Thunderbolt” Ross’s daughter, has been kidnapped! Encounters with A.I.M. and gamma powered brawls are just the beginning for S.H.I.E.L.D.
Tempers flare as the Hulks go on the warpath. Keeping collateral damage to a minimum is top priority.
Known for forgiveness, has S.H.I.E.L.D. gone too far this time? Actions speak louder than words, with new faces and old friends.
The Eclipse may be more than just a rare celestial occurrence. Hit the streets to give Dr. Strange the time he needs to investigate the mystery.
Split your resources to combat the Demon threat in New York and the Vampire menace in London.
Even the best laid plans never seem to survive contact with the enemy. Especially when the ring leaders of this accord are Dracula and Mephisto.
Dr. Strange has all he needs to stop the eclipse and restore order to the planet. With the true intentions of this dark alliance finally revealed. S.H.I.E.L.D. is in for a climactic final battle.

Moondragon has succumbed to its promise of Cosmic power! Star-Lord trusts S.H.I.E.L.D. only as far as he can throw the helicarrier, and decides to keep the Black Vortex safe and heal Moondragon without S.H.I.E.L.D.'s intervention. Well, most of S.H.I.E.L.D., the Agent is an honorary Guardian of the Galaxy after all.

Theft! It looks like the remnants of the Hellfire Club heard about the Guardian’s “secret cargo”. How much help can S.H.I.E.L.D. provide while being kept in the dark? It might be time for Star-Lord to come clean before things go to hell in a handbasket.

The Black Vortex is too dangerous to keep lying around, seducing people with its cosmic power. There’s only one problem, Cosmic Powered Spartoi and Villains, under the command of the ruthless J’son stand in the way.
A standard mission, get out there and get to it. Bring the agent and any heroes to complete this mission.
mission.previewText: Standard - All Heroes! Missions are unrestricted. Any hero may participate in today's Daily Mission.

mission.description: Teamwork is the name of the game for this mission. Complete the mission using a group of heroes known for their team affiliation.
mission.previewText: Teamwork - West Coast Avengers only! Missions are restricted to a particular Team. Only West Coast Avengers may participate in today's Daily Mission. Includes: Hawkeye, War Machine, Mockingbird, Tigra, Wasp, Hank Pym, Vision, Wonder Man, Moon Knight

mission.previewText: Free For All - All Heroes! Missions are unrestricted. Any hero, except the Agent, Doctor Doom, and Kang may participate in today's Daily Mission.

mission.description: There's chaos in San Francisco, and S.H.I.E.L.D. is taking the blame. Dell Rusk and the World Security Council think they can do better. Prove them wrong.

Rusk now has his own version of the Avengers. They may have the same costumes, but these are no heroes. We need to take down these "Dark Avengers" before the public starts thinking there's a civil war amongst our ranks.
It's obvious now that Rusk is creating problems just so his team can solve them. Here's an idea: let's create some problems for him, and "solve" the Dark Avengers.
A.I.M. is trying to flush out the AI that Hank Pym has discovered. The last thing they need is more advanced ideas.
mission.previewText: Brains over brawn in a battle against A.I.M.

mission.description: Dr. Pym's research on a hopefully peaceful robot is under assault by very warlike robots.
mission.previewText: Broken Sentinels getting fixed up.

mission.description: Time's up! Pym's AI project is in the home stretch, but there are a few very powerful men who do not want him to finish.
mission.previewText: The future is here.

mission.description: Kang came all this way for some Iso-8 and some conquering, and he's damn well going to get some. He's declared he'll take everything he can before the end of all things... whatever that means. Whiplash and the Crimson Dynamo have jumped onto the Kang-wagon for the promise of new tech.
mission.previewText: It’s a high tech showdown in San Francisco. Bystanders beware!

mission.description: Ares has a grudge against the Taskmaster following him to Wakanda, where he uncovers what looks like a plot to pave the way for a HYDRA takeover of Wakanda. But with Nick Fury involved, who knows what counter plots have been set in motion.
mission.previewText: Gods are known for their long memory, but few can capitalize on a grudge like Ares.

mission.description: Circle of 8 in Central Park. Squirrel Girl unleashes her sciuridaean hordes! ... and catches Bullseye and the Hood monitoring what the Circle of 8 cultists are doing. C8 calls for a one-on-one match with Captain America.
mission.previewText: Bulls-Eye, Squirrel Girl, Circle of Eight Cultists, and a true American patriot. What else does Chinatown hold?

mission.description: Emma Frost starts a concerted effort to clear out members of questionable quality from the Hellfire Club.
mission.previewText: Help Emma clean Hellfire Club’s organization; watch out for anyone with different ideas on cleanliness.

mission.description: Ragnarok thinks he's Thor because the Enchantress has beguiled him. The real Thor shows up in order to put things right.
mission.previewText: Help Thor clean up after Ragnarok, looks like he’ll need it.

mission.description: Ares and Hercules are in a divinity-waving contest over who can save more of Wakanda. Good thing there's plenty of problems to go around: Man-Ape, HYDRA, and the White Gorillas are sure to keep them busy.
mission.previewText: Lot’s of problems in Wakanda, nothing that an angry demi-god can’t help fix up.

mission.description: Scarlet Witch and Quicksilver went to Wakanda investigating a connection between U.L.T.I.M.A.T.U.M. with HYDRA but have not reported in.

The decision to leave the Hulk behind to defend New York was already debatable, and after this, the cons may forever outweigh the pros. Mission 2 contains an Epic Boss Event, available only once Task 25 has been completed. Complete Task 25, return to Mission 2 and complete all Deploys and combat events to reveal the Hulkbuster versus Hulk Epic Boss Event!
Once more into Wakanda, to put an end to the mechanical menace.
Moondragon Challenge
Lizard kings and super science create a deadly combination for the Savage Land’s native inhabitants.
The struggle for supremacy in the Savage Land has made for some strange bedfellows. Trace the lines back to the ring leaders.
As if coping with mutated natives, Incursions, and genetic manipulators wasn’t enough, the Savage Land now faces a renewed A.I.M.
Remotely operated Servo Guards and Power Armor invade Hank Pym's research facility, opening the doors for techno-thieves.
Hank finds that sometimes you need a little help from your friends, and then some even smaller help from the guy who stole your new suit.
You know you've spent too much time alone in your lab when you've created robotic counterparts of friends and acquaintances for company.
dummy mission for DR
M.O.D.O.K. claims he has intelligence on the Circle of 8’s purpose. Could there be a move by HYDRA to reabsorb A.I.M.?
mission.previewText: M.O.D.O.K. shows up leading A.I.M. in New York, a mysterious event, leaves more questions than answers.

mission.description: Ancient feuds come to light with the machinations of the Circle of 8.
mission.previewText: An ancient fued erupts in London between Kang and Moon Knight. Only a lunatic would get between the two.

mission.description: Iron Fist hits the ground running, wanting to take the fight to the Hellfire Club. But complications arise... is that the Dark Avengers?
mission.previewText: The Hellfire Club may know more than they are letting on... Iron Fist takes to the streats to find out.

mission.description: Mephisto, sensing the time is right, makes a play for New York. Those souls won’t harvest themselves, after all. Enter Ghost Rider.
mission.previewText: Things are heating up in New York as Mephisto rears his ugly head.

mission.description: New York becomes a true battlefield as Blackheart enlists Dormammu’s aid. S.H.I.E.L.D. calls on Doctor Voodoo, who steps in to help quell the Demonic and Mindless forces.
mission.previewText: Now Dormammu? This new York heat wave keeps getting worse!

mission.description: The Maggia, A.I.M., and HYDRA. OH MY! But wait, who’s this? Looks you’ll have to play to find out! This looks like a job for Deadpool! I guess I better get in there and break some walls, or is that heads…? To find some answers.
mission.previewText: The crisis in New York is now full scale. Best to let Deadpool scale that wall... or break it.

mission.description: Portals are opening up all over the city, and the legions of Hell are pouring through them.
mission.previewText: Demon portals are appearing in New York City!

mission.description: Dormammu has threatened before, but with the boundaries between realities weakened, he is striking at Dr Strange's own home.
mission.previewText: Magics from the Dark Dimension seeps through reality to Greenwich Village

mission.description: More portals have opened up in Hell's Kitchen. Close them before these hellspawn make themselves at home.
mission.previewText: Hell's Kitchen earns it's name.

mission.description: A close encounter with Karn, and Jack O’ Lantern, means all bets are off. It’s time to clean up the Webbed Up thugs with your friendly multi-dimensional hopping Spiders.
Prison breaks and high tech drugs make up the backdrop of our Spider-Man’s homecoming. It’s a good thing too as the Symbiotes are on the warpath, with a Spider rich environment, where Carnage reigns.
The Inheritors scheme is revealed, and Silk is the key. Green Goblin, keen on maintaining a shaky alliance will do everything in his psychotic mind to keep her from S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Spider Army.
Did the Pulse rip the fabric of reality? Strange forces are at work and they aren't from around here.
mission.previewText: Sugar Man runs experiments on Test Subjects near St. Patrick's.

mission.description: If you want to find the Hellfire Club, just look for the most expensive places to live on the planet. Once you find them, you have permission to lower property values.
mission.previewText: The Hellfire Club is running a new operation out of Trafalgar Square in London.

mission.description: To paraphrase a local: "Tact is the ability to tell someone to go to fight the Hellfire Club in such a way that they look forward to the trip."
mission.previewText: Dragoness is holed up in the Tower of London, like a bad fairy tale.

mission.description: Vulture has been sighted near the Palace of Westminster, and it's doubtful he's been appointed to the House of Lords.
mission.previewText: Vulture has deployed some of these new test subjects near Westminster.

mission.description: The Hellfire Club's leadership is finally on the playing board. Let's see if we can capture the Black Queen.
mission.previewText: Black castles queenside.

mission.description: A.I.M. and magic usually don't mix - so why is M.O.D.O.K. trying to steal magical artifacts?
mission.previewText: Back in New York, M.O.D.O.K is practicing a vanishing illusion.

mission.description: The Circle of Eight is acting openly. Why can't bad guys get library cards like the rest of us?
mission.previewText: The Circle of Eight attack the New York Public Library. Quietly.

mission.description: The Hand is working with the Circle of Eight. Are they one and the same, or is it merely a case of aligned interests?
mission.previewText: Hand-holding with the Circle of Eight in downtown San Francisco.

mission.description: There is plenty going on in the Presidio without the Circle of Eight showing up there. If they wanted to tour LucasArts, they are in for a disappointment.
mission.previewText: Vision is invited to the most android friendly part of San Francisco.

mission.description: New cults are a nice distraction from the norm, but Hydra is still out there, and it sounds like Zemo is up to something new.
mission.previewText: Hydra rears its heads back in New York as Zemo tries to impress the new boss.

mission.description: When the street talks, S.H.I.E.L.D. listens. The Hood is gunning for Luke Cage - not advisable when your target is bulletproof.
mission.previewText: The Hood leads some hoods on a crime spree. Luke Cage should put them in a cage.

mission.description: Sugar Man is back, and trying to set up a base on Alcatraz. We need to let him know he is in the wrong reality.
mission.previewText: Sugar Man is sweetening the pot for the Circle of Eight on Alcatraz.

mission.description: The Worthy are on a rampage in London. Looking to avoid annihilation, the Hellfire Club turn to Morgan le Fay to show them a way out.
Seeking a new power source, the Red Skull draws upon the power of Incursions with catastrophic results.
Rumors of a deal between Kingpin and Mephisto puts the inhabitants of New York in jeopardy.
Seeking a way off of Earth, M.O.D.O.K. constructs a dimensional portal. Unfortunately, something was waiting on the other side.
The foes of Asgard join forces against a common threat and take the first steps toward their mighty scheme.
Many have come to Madripoor to seek the Mandarin's protection from Incursions, but who will protect the Mandarin from a vengeful Iron Man?
The Living Pharaoh is on the loose, and the only way to prevent his transformation into the Living Monolith is to find his lab. The Hellfire Club and Dragoness won't make it easy.
mission.previewText: Dragoness spreads her wings.

mission.description: Brotherhood forces have joined the Hellfire Club to protect the Living Pharaoh. But Magneto seems to be missing...
mission.previewText: The Brotherhood of Mutants wants in on the Syndicate.

mission.description: Nothing stands in the way between S.H.I.E.L.D. and the Living Pharaoh's lab. Except the Hellfire Club. And the Brotherhood. And possibly the Living Monolith.
mission.previewText: The Living Pharaoh is found!

mission.description: To make things interesting, Arcade has seeded his Murderworld with robotic clones of heroes and villains. Make sure it's a machine before you shoot.
This section of Murderworld is devoted to mutants, with simmering rivalries brought to the boiling point. Is there any way out?
Looks like Arcade's interests have taken a turn for the mystical in this section. If Nico Minoru's still inside Murderworld, she's here.
Thanos and his Black Order have offered S.H.I.E.L.D. a choice: Tribute or Gauntlet. We're making our own choice: Fight Back. Why Thanos is here is a question for another time.
Dr. Strange has been beguiled into unleashing demons across New York. Luckily Black Bolt has joined us to help, but there's a secret behind that stoic silence. What is he not telling us?

The hunt is on for the mysterious Thane. Whoever he is, Thanos wants him... which means we have to do everything in our power to keep Thane out of his hands. And while we're at it, prevent the Black Order from murdering millions.
